name: Red Death Fighter
description:
Universe aircraft battle is beginning!

In the Universe, we are in danger because of crazy aggression from alien spacecraft, in times of crisis, our hero Red Inflammation Death is born. Face to the powerful enemies, can we win the final victory?

Our hero, you, will save our world. Please lead us to win the final victory.

Features:

1. A variety of different enemy aircrafts
2. Powerful weapon upgrade system
3. Brilliant game background and attack effect
4. A cool universe Fighter of game
